definition: it is essential to (complete a project on time, be thorough etc)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The fiction of a practically exclusively American operation would be preserved as long as possible.
sentences.chinese: 实施美国单独作战之假想，务期尽可能地予以保持。

sentences.english: Thee fiction of a practically exclusively American operation would be preserved as long as possible.
sentences.chinese: 实施美国单独作战之假想，务期尽可能地予以保持。

sentences.english: Do you have any unexpired contract or service agreement with your present employer?
sentences.chinese: 与现任雇主的合同或服务期协议是否到期？

sentences.english: The Employer's Representative may at any time during the Operation Service instruct the Contractor to suspend the progress of the Operation Service.
sentences.chinese: 业主代表可以在运营服务期任何时候指示承包商暂停。

definition: responsibility must lie where it belongs (idiom)
to laze about without doing anything productive
to be in overall charge/to oversee
